sentences.sContent: The rooms are crammed with humming Xerox machines.
sentences.sCn: 那些房间里摆满了嗡嗡作响的施乐复印机。

sentences.sContent: I should have simply Xeroxed this sheet for you.
sentences.sCn: 我本应该只为你复印这张。

synos.tran: 施乐（商标名，美国办公设备制造公司）；影印，[印刷]静电印刷品

words.tran: [印刷] 静电复印术；电子照相法

trans.tranCn: 施乐（商标名，美国办公设备制造公司）；影印，静电印刷品
trans.tranOther: A Xerox is a machine that can make copies of pieces of paper which have writing or other marks on them
If you Xerox a document, you make a copy of it using a Xerox machine
